00003 // = LIBRARY

00006 // = FILENAME
00007 //    event.h - wrapper for libevent (A library to execute a function when a

00020 #include <event.h>
00021 
00022 extern U_EXPORT struct event_base* u_ev_base;
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * libevent is a popular API that provides a mechanism to execute a callback
00026  * function when a specific event occurs on a file descriptor or after a
00027  * timeout has been reached. Furthermore, libevent also support callbacks due
00028  * to signals or regular timeouts.
00029  */
00030 
00037 class U_EXPORT UEvent_Base : public event {
00038 public:
00039 
00040         // NB: l'oggetto puo' essere usato come (struct event) in quanto UMemoryError viene allocato dopo...
00041         U_MEMORY_TEST
00042 
00043         // Allocator e Deallocator
00044         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00045         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00046 
00053         int fd() { return EVENT_FD(this); }
00054 
00064         bool pending(short ev = EV_READ, UTimeVal* tv = 0)
00065                 {
00066                 U_TRACE(1, "UEvent_Base::pending(%hd,%p)", ev, tv)
00067 
00068                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_pending, "%p,%hd,%p", this, ev, tv)) U_RETURN(true);
00069 
00070                 U_RETURN(false);
00071                 }
00072 
00079         bool timeout(UTimeVal& tv) { return pending(EV_TIMEOUT, &tv); }
00080 
00091         bool priority(int priority)
00092                 {
00093                 U_TRACE(1, "UEvent_Base::priority(%d)", priority)
00094 
00095                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MSG((ev_flags & EVLIST_ACTIVE) != 0, "can't change the priority of an active event")
00096 
00097                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_priority_set, "%p,%d", this, priority)) U_RETURN(false);
00098 
00099                 U_RETURN(true);
00100                 }
00101 
00102 #ifdef DEBUG
00103         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 protected:
00107         UEvent_Base()                                                                            {} // NB: This is an concept class, you can't instantiate it.
00108 
00109 private:
00110         UEvent_Base(const UEvent_Base&)                          {}
00111         UEvent_Base& operator=(const UEvent_Base&) { return *this; }
00112 };
00113 
00129 typedef void (*ccallback_type)(int, short, void*); // C function used as callback in the C API
00130 
00131 template <typename F> class U_EXPORT UEvent : public UEvent_Base {
00132 public:
00133 
00142         UEvent(int fd, short ev, F& handler)
00143                 {
00144                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEvent<F>, "%d,%hd,%p", fd, ev, &handler)
00145 
00146                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(event_set, "%p,%d,%hd,%p,%p", this, fd, ev, wrapper, (void*)&handler);
00147                 }
00148 
00149         ~UEvent()
00150                 {
00151                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEvent)
00152                 }
00153 
00154 #ifdef DEBUG
00155         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UEvent_Base::dump(reset); }
00156 #endif
00157 
00158         static void wrapper(int fd, short ev, void* h)
00159                 {
00160                 U_TRACE(0, "UEvent::wrapper(%d,%hd,%p)", fd, ev, h)
00161 
00162                 F& handler = *(F*)h;
00163 
00164                 handler(fd, ev);
00165                 }
00166 
00167 protected:
00168         UEvent() {}
00169 
00170 private:
00171         UEvent<F>(const UEvent<F>&)            {}
00172         UEvent<F>& operator=(const UEvent<F>&) { return *this; }
00173 };
00174

00194                 {
00195                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEvent<ccallback_type>, "%d,%hd,%p,%p", fd, ev, handler, arg)
00196 
00197                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(event_set, "%p,%d,%hd,%p,%p", this, fd, ev, handler, arg);
00198                 }
00199 
00200         ~UEvent()
00201                 {
00202                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEvent)
00203                 }
00204 
00205 #ifdef DEBUG
00206         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UEvent_Base::dump(reset); }
00207 #endif
00208 
00209 protected:
00210         UEvent() {}
00211 
00212 private:
00213         UEvent<ccallback_type>(const UEvent<ccallback_type>&) : UEvent_Base() {}
00214         UEvent<ccallback_type>& operator=(const UEvent<ccallback_type>&)                 { return *this; }
00215 };

00232 template <typename F> class U_EXPORT UTimerEv : public UEvent<F> {
00233 public:
00234 
00241         UTimerEv(F& handler)
00242                 {
00243                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTimerEv, "%p", &handler)
00244 
00245                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(event_set, "%p,%d,%hd,%p,%p", this, -1, 0, UEvent<F>::wrapper, (void*)&handler);
00246                 }
00247 
00248         ~UTimerEv()
00249                 {
00250                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTimerEv)
00251                 }
00252 
00253 #ifdef DEBUG
00254         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UEvent_Base::dump(reset); }
00255 #endif
00256 
00257 protected:
00258         UTimerEv() {}
00259 
00260 private:
00261         UTimerEv(const UTimerEv&)            {}
00262         UTimerEv& operator=(const UTimerEv&) { return *this; }
00263 };

00323 template <typename F> class U_EXPORT USignal : public UEvent<F> {
00324 public:
00325 
00333         USignal(int signum, F& handler)
00334                 {
00335                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USignal, "%d,%p", signum, &handler)
00336 
00337                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(event_set, "%p,%d,%hd,%p,%p", this, signum, EV_SIGNAL | EV_PERSIST, UEvent<F>::wrapper, (void*)&handler);
00338                 }
00339 
00340         ~USignal()
00341                 {
00342                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USignal)
00343                 }
00344

00352

00355 #endif

00417 typedef UEvent<ccallback_type>   cevent;        // Shortcut to C-style event.
00418 typedef USignal<ccallback_type>  csignal;       // Shortcut to C-style signal handler.
00419 typedef UTimerEv<ccallback_type> ctimer;  // Shortcut to C-style timer.

00430 template <typename O, typename M> class U_EXPORT UMemCb {
00431 public:
00432 
00446         UMemCb(O& object, M method) : _object(object), _method(method) {}
00447 
00448         void operator()(int fd, short ev) { (_object.*_method)(fd, ev); }
00449 
00450 protected:
00451         O& _object;
00452         M  _method;
00453 };

00469 class U_EXPORT UDispatcher {
00470 public:
00471 
00472         // Miscellaneous constants
00473 
00474         enum {
00475                 DEFAULT_PRIORITY = -1,                                  // Default priority (the middle value).
00476                 ONCE                              = EVLOOP_ONCE,     // Loop just once.
00477                 NONBLOCK                          = EVLOOP_NONBLOCK  // Don't block the event loop.
00478         };
00479 
00486         static bool priority_init(int npriorities)
00487                 {
00488                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::priority_init(%d)", npriorities)
00489 
00490                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_base_priority_init, "%p,%d", u_ev_base, npriorities)) U_RETURN(false);
00491 
00492                 U_RETURN(true);
00493                 }
00494 
00502         static bool add(UEvent_Base& e, int priority = DEFAULT_PRIORITY)
00503                 {
00504                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add(%p,%d)", &e, priority)
00505 
00506         //      if (U_SYSCALL(event_base_set, "%p,%p", u_ev_base, &e)) U_RETURN(false);
00507 
00508                 if (priority != DEFAULT_PRIORITY &&
00509                          U_SYSCALL(event_priority_set, "%p,%d", &e, priority))
00510                         {
00511                         U_RETURN(false);
00512                         }
00513 
00514                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_add, "%p,%p", &e, 0)) U_RETURN(false);
00515 
00516                 U_RETURN(true);
00517                 }
00518 
00530         static bool add(UEvent_Base& e, const UTimeVal& to, int priority = DEFAULT_PRIORITY)
00531                 {
00532                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add(%p,%O,%d)", &e, U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(to), priority)
00533 
00534         //      if (U_SYSCALL(event_base_set, "%p,%p", u_ev_base, &e)) U_RETURN(false);
00535 
00536                 if (priority != DEFAULT_PRIORITY &&
00537                          U_SYSCALL(event_priority_set, "%p,%d", &e, priority))
00538                         {
00539                         U_RETURN(false);
00540                         }
00541 
00542                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_add, "%p,%p", &e, (timeval*)&to)) U_RETURN(false);
00543 
00544                 U_RETURN(true);
00545                 }
00546 
00558         template <typename F> static bool add_once(int fd, short ev, F& handler)
00559                 {
00560                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once(%d,%hd,%p)", fd, ev, &handler)
00561 
00562                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once, "%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p", fd, ev, UDispatcher::wrapper<F>, (void*)&handler, 0)) U_RETURN(false);
00563 
00564                 U_RETURN(true);
00565                 }
00566 
00579         template <typename F> static bool add_once(int fd, short ev, F& handler, const UTimeVal& to)
00580                 {
00581                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once(%d,%hd,%p,%O)", fd, ev, &handler, U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(to))
00582 
00583                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once, "%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p", fd, ev, UDispatcher::wrapper<F>, (void*)&handler, (timeval*)&to)) U_RETURN(false);
00584 
00585                 U_RETURN(true);
00586                 }
00587

00601                 {
00602                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once(%d,%hd,%p,%p)", fd, ev, handler, arg)
00603 
00604                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once, "%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p", fd, ev, handler, arg, 0)) U_RETURN(false);
00605 
00606                 U_RETURN(true);
00607                 }

00622         static bool add_once(int fd, short ev, ccallback_type handler, void* arg, const UTimeVal& to)
00623                 {
00624                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once(%d,%hd,%p,%p,%O)", fd, ev, handler, arg, U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(to))
00625 
00626                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once, "%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p", fd, ev, handler, arg, (timeval*)&to)) U_RETURN(false);

00641         template <typename F> static bool add_once_timer(F& handler, const UTimeVal& to)
00642                 {
00643                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once_timer(%p,%O)", &handler, U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(to))
00644 
00645                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once,"%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p",-1,EV_TIMEOUT,UDispatcher::wrapper<F>,(void*)&handler,(timeval*)&to)) U_RETURN(false);
00646 
00647                 U_RETURN(true);
00648                 }
00649 
00661         static bool add_once_timer(ccallback_type handler, void* arg, const UTimeVal& to)
00662                 {
00663                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::add_once_timer(%p,%p,%O)", handler, arg, U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(to))
00664 
00665                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_once, "%d,%hd,%p,%p,%p", -1, EV_TIMEOUT, handler, arg, (timeval*)&to)) U_RETURN(false);
00666 
00667                 U_RETURN(true);
00668                 }

00678         static bool del(UEvent_Base* e)
00679                 {
00680                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::del(%p)", e)
00681 
00682                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(e)
00683 
00684                 if (U_SYSCALL(event_del, "%p", e)) U_RETURN(false);
00685 
00686                 U_RETURN(true);
00687                 }
00688 
00711         static int dispatch(int flags = 0)
00712                 {
00713                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::dispatch(%d)", flags)
00714 
00715                 int ret = U_SYSCALL(event_base_loop, "%p,%d", u_ev_base, flags);
00716 
00717                 U_RETURN(ret);
00718                 }
00719 
00729         static int exit(const UTimeVal* to = 0)
00730                 {
00731                 U_TRACE(1, "UDispatcher::exit(%p)", to)
00732 
00733                 int ret = U_SYSCALL(event_base_loopexit, "%p,%p", u_ev_base, (timeval*)to);
00734 
00735                 U_RETURN(ret);
00736                 }
00737 
00738 protected:
00739         template <typename F> static void wrapper(int fd, short ev, void* h)
00740                 {
00741                 U_TRACE(0, "UDispatcher::wrapper(%d,%hd,%p)", fd, ev, h)
00742 
00743                 F& handler = *(F*)h;
00744 
00745                 handler(fd, ev);
00746                 }
00747 
00748 private:
00749         UDispatcher(const UDispatcher&)                          {}
00750         UDispatcher& operator=(const UDispatcher&) { return *this; }
00751 };
